title: Science Job Competency Enhancement Course Using Remote Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Establishment of non-face-to-face collaborative learning environments using an LMS (Learning Activity Management System), with enhanced experimental/analytical activities through VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can perform over 80% of synchronous/asynchronous scientific problem-solving processes with peer learners using LMS-based collaboration tools.
Learners can independently analyze and share results of science experiment scenarios presented in VR simulation environments three or more times.
Learners can improve assignments by incorporating over 90% of feedback provided during collaborative learning processes through formative assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
